title: ITwoMemberCornerTreatmentFeatureData.MiterTrimPlanePoint
description: Gets and sets the point through which to create the miter trim for this two member corner treatment feature.
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ITwoMemberCornerTreatmentFeatureData::CornerTreatmentTrimType
is set to
swCornerTreatmentTrimType_e
.swCornerTreatmentTrim_MiterTrim.
